cards.name: Karn, the Great Creator
cards.text:
Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated.
[+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.
[−2]: You may reveal an artifact card you own from outside the game or choose a face-up artifact card you own in exile. Put that card into your hand.

foreignPrintings.name: 大いなる創造者、カーン

cards.name: Ugin, the Ineffable
cards.text:
Colorless spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
[+1]: Exile the top card of your library face down and look at it. Create a 2/2 colorless Spirit creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into your hand.
[−3]: Destroy target permanent that's one or more colors.

foreignPrintings.name: 人知を超えるもの、ウギン

cards.name: Ugin's Conjurant
cards.text:
Ugin's Conjurant enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Ugin's Conjurant while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from Ugin's Conjurant.

cards.name: Ajani's Pridemate
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
cards.flavor: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.

cards.name: Battlefield Promotion
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district-now let's go save the world."

cards.name: Bond of Discipline
cards.text: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "We agree that order benefits everyone, but not until you enforce it."

cards.name: Bulwark Giant
cards.text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
cards.flavor:
"Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
-Gideon Jura

cards.name: Charmed Stray
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Charmed Stray enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Charmed Stray.
cards.flavor:
"There's something peculiar about the cats today."
-Janoc, Tin Street tinker

cards.name: Defiant Strike
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

cards.name: Divine Arrow
cards.text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.

cards.name: Enforcer Griffin
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
-Tajic

cards.name: Finale of Glory
cards.text: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.
cards.flavor: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. then the angels brought the dawn.

cards.name: Gideon Blackblade
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, Gideon Blackblade is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Gideon Blackblade during your turn.
[+1]: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn.
[−6]: Exile target nonland permanent.

cards.name: Gideon's Sacrifice
cards.text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).
cards.flavor: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.

cards.name: Gideon's Triumph
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.
cards.flavor: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.

cards.name: God-Eternal Oketra
cards.text:
Double strike
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance.
When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

cards.name: Grateful Apparition
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Ignite the Beacon
cards.text: Search your library for up to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"If you can't save yourself, you fight to give someone else a chance."
-Ajani Goldmane

cards.name: Ironclad Krovod
cards.flavor:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
-Gideon Jura

cards.name: Law-Rune Enforcer
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with mana value 2 or greater.
cards.flavor:
"See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity."
-Dovin Baan

foreignPrintings.name: Ejecutor de runas de la ley

cards.name: Loxodon Sergeant
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Loxodon Sergeant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

cards.name: Makeshift Battalion
cards.text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
cards.flavor: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

cards.name: Martyr for the Cause
cards.text: When Martyr for the Cause dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."

cards.name: Parhelion II
cards.text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance
Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Pouncing Lynx
cards.text: As long as it's your turn, Pouncing Lynx has first strike.
cards.flavor: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"

foreignPrintings.name: 飛びかかるオオヤマネコ

cards.name: Prison Realm
cards.text:
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Prison Realm leaves the battlefield.
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, scry 1.
cards.flavor: After millennia to craft victory, Bolas had eternity to contemplate defeat.

cards.name: Rally of Wings
cards.text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.

cards.name: Ravnica at War
cards.text: Exile all multicolored permanents.
cards.flavor: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.

cards.name: Rising Populace
cards.text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.
cards.flavor: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

cards.name: Single Combat
cards.text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.
cards.flavor: Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse could persuade them to put aside their feud.

cards.name: Sunblade Angel
cards.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
cards.flavor: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the Parhelion II, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.

cards.name: Teyo, the Shieldmage
cards.text:
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
[−2]: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

cards.name: Teyo's Lightshield
cards.text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
cards.flavor: Teyo gifted shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.

cards.name: Tomik, Distinguished Advokist
cards.text:
Flying
Lands on the battlefield and land cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Your opponents can't play land cards from graveyards.
cards.flavor: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots."

cards.name: Topple the Statue
cards.text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

cards.name: Trusted Pegasus
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Would you give your life to save the world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.

cards.name: The Wanderer
cards.text:
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control.
[−2]: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Wanderer's Strike
cards.text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
-Lavinia

cards.name: War Screecher
cards.text:
Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.

cards.name: Ashiok's Skulker
cards.text: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
-Ashiok

cards.name: Augur of Bolas
cards.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor: "There is no future save the one my master wills."

cards.name: Aven Eternal
cards.text:
Flying
When Aven Eternal enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
-Tajic

cards.name: Bond of Insight
cards.text: Each player mills four cards. Return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Bond of Insight.
cards.flavor: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."

cards.name: Callous Dismissal
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor:
"They make it clear we are nothing to them."
-Lavinia

cards.name: Commence the Endgame
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw two cards, then amass X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor:
"Even gods shall kneel."
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Contentious Plan
cards.text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Niv Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.

cards.name: Crush Dissent
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor:
"All I ask is complete obedience."
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Erratic Visionary
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

cards.name: Eternal Skylord
cards.text:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

cards.name: Fblthp, the Lost
cards.text:
When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead.
When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

cards.name: Finale of Revelation
cards.text:
Draw X cards. If X is 10 or more, instead shuffle your graveyard into your library, draw X cards, untap up to five lands, and you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
Exile Finale of Revelation.
cards.flavor: Ugin saw the gem that connected Bolas to his Meditation Realm as the key to his brother's downfall.

cards.name: Flux Channeler
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."

cards.name: God-Eternal Kefnet
cards.text:
Flying
You may reveal the first card you draw each turn as you draw it. Whenever you reveal an instant or sorcery card this way, copy that card and you may cast the copy. That copy costs {2} less to cast.
When God-Eternal Kefnet dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

cards.name: Jace, Wielder of Mysteries
cards.text:
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
[+1]: Target player mills two cards. Draw a card.
[−8]: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

foreignPrintings.name: 神秘を操る者、ジェイス

cards.name: Jace's Triumph
cards.text: Draw two cards. If you control a Jace planeswalker, draw three cards instead.
cards.flavor: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.

cards.name: Kasmina, Enigmatic Mentor
cards.text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a creature or planeswalker you control cost {2} more to cast.
[−2]: Create a 2/2 blue Wizard creature token. Draw a card, then discard a card.

foreignPrintings.name: 謎めいた指導者、カズミナ

cards.name: Kasmina's Transmutation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.
cards.flavor:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
-Kasmina

cards.name: Kiora's Dambreaker
cards.text: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor:
"When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."
-Kiora

cards.name: Lazotep Plating
cards.text:
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Naga Eternal
cards.flavor:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
-Samut

cards.name: Narset, Parter of Veils
cards.text:
Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn.
[−2]: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

foreignPrintings.name: 覆いを割く者、ナーセット

cards.name: Narset's Reversal
cards.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, then return it to its owner's hand. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor:
"In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon."
-Narset

cards.name: No Escape
cards.text:
Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Scry 1.
cards.flavor: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.

cards.name: Relentless Advance
cards.text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.

cards.name: Rescuer Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."

cards.name: Silent Submersible
cards.text:
Whenever Silent Submersible deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Sky Theater Strix
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.

cards.name: Spark Double
cards.text: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary if that permanent is legendary.

cards.name: Spellkeeper Weird
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.

cards.name: Stealth Mission
cards.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
-Lazav

cards.name: Tamiyo's Epiphany
cards.text: Scry 4, then draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.

cards.name: Teferi's Time Twist
cards.text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: "The safest place for you is not now."

foreignPrintings.name: テフェリーの時間改変

cards.name: Thunder Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.
cards.flavor: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.

cards.name: Totally Lost
cards.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.

cards.name: Wall of Runes
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.flavor:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
-Lavinia

cards.name: Aid the Fallen
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I never liked you. Now get up-we have a fight to finish."

cards.name: Banehound
cards.text: Lifelink, haste
cards.flavor:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
-Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

cards.name: Bleeding Edge
cards.text: Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

cards.name: Bolas's Citadel
cards.text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

cards.name: Bond of Revival
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until your next turn.
cards.flavor: "Today we throw off the yoke of death. Either this is an affirmation of the eternal cyclical nature of life, or it's just hilarious-depends on which of us you ask."

cards.name: Charity Extractor
cards.text: Lifelink
cards.flavor: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."

cards.name: Command the Dreadhorde
cards.text: Choose any number of target creature and/or planeswalker cards in graveyards. Command the Dreadhorde deals damage to you equal to the total mana value of those cards. Put them onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: Liliana seized the reins of Bolas's vast army, gritting her teeth behind the Chain Veil.

cards.name: Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage
cards.text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them.
[−1]: Target player discards a card.

foreignPrintings.name: はぐれ影魔道士、ダブリエル

cards.name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
cards.text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.

cards.name: Deliver Unto Evil
cards.text:
Choose up to four target cards in your graveyard. If you control a Bolas planeswalker, return those cards to your hand. Otherwise, an opponent chooses two of them. Leave the chosen cards in your graveyard and put the rest into your hand.
Exile Deliver Unto Evil.

cards.name: Dreadhorde Invasion
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

foreignPrintings.name: Invasión de la Horda del Terror
Invasion de la Horde de l'effroi

cards.name: Dreadmalkin
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or planeswalker: Put two +1/+1 counters on Dreadmalkin.
cards.flavor: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.

cards.name: Duskmantle Operative
cards.text: Duskmantle Operative can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?" The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."

foreignPrintings.name: ダスクマントルの調査員

cards.name: The Elderspell
cards.text: Destroy any number of target planeswalkers. Choose a planeswalker you control. Put two loyalty counters on it for each planeswalker destroyed this way.
cards.flavor: The path to power is often paved with atrocities.

cards.name: Eternal Taskmaster
cards.text:
Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
-Jace Beleren

cards.name: Finale of Eternity
cards.text: Destroy up to three target creatures with toughness X or less. If X is 10 or more, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: When you rule by fear, your greatest weakness is one who's no longer afraid.

cards.name: God-Eternal Bontu
cards.text:
Menace
When God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other permanents, then draw that many cards.
When God-Eternal Bontu dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

cards.name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
cards.text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

foreignPrintings.name: Heraldo de la Horda del Terror
Héraut de la Horde de l'effroi

cards.name: Kaya's Ghostform
cards.text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker you control
When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.

cards.name: Lazotep Behemoth
cards.flavor:
"I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"
-Mileva, Boros legionnaire

cards.name: Lazotep Reaver
cards.text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

cards.name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
[+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
[−4]: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
[−9]: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

foreignPrintings.name: Liliana, générale de la Horde de l'effroi
戦慄衆の将軍、リリアナ

cards.name: Liliana's Triumph
cards.text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.
cards.flavor: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.

cards.name: Massacre Girl
cards.text:
Menace
When Massacre Girl enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than Massacre Girl gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player.
[−2]: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

foreignPrintings.name: Ob Nixilis, deformado por el odio
Ob Nixilis, perverti par la haine
憎悪に歪む者、オブ・ニクシリス

cards.name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty

foreignPrintings.name: オブ・ニクシリスの残虐

cards.name: Shriekdiver

Flying

cards.flavor:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
-Shauntal, Boros legionnaire

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

cards.text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

cards.name: Goblin Assailant

Haste

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Gleaming Overseer
cards.text:
When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

cards.name: Heartwarming Redemption
cards.text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards plus one. You gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
cards.flavor: Kytheon had known war every day of his life. Now he finally knew peace.

cards.name: Huatli's Raptor
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Huatli's Raptor enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.

cards.name: Invade the City
cards.text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
cards.flavor: Death greeted the world with a roar of desert air.

cards.name: Leyline Prowler
cards.text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: It feeds on the dark energies that course through the deep world-and on any other creature lured by the leyline's pull.

cards.name: Living Twister
cards.text:
{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Living Twister deals 2 damage to any target.
{G}: Return a tapped land you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!"
-Nikya of the Old Ways

cards.name: Mayhem Devil
cards.text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.

cards.name: Merfolk Skydiver
cards.text:
Flying
When Merfolk Skydiver enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{3}{G}{U}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

foreignPrintings.name: マーフォークのスカイダイバー

cards.name: Neoform
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it, then shuffle.

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God
cards.text:
Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
[+1]: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
[−3]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
[−8]: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

foreignPrintings.name: 龍神、ニコル・ボーラス

cards.name: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
cards.text:
Flying
When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Oath of Kaya
cards.text:
When Oath of Kaya enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent attacks a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, Oath of Kaya deals 2 damage to that player and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "So everyone gets what they truly deserve, I will keep watch."

cards.name: Pledge of Unity
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"No one hero will save this day. Today we must all be heroes."
-Gideon Jura

cards.name: Ral, Storm Conduit
cards.text:
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
[+2]: Scry 1.
[−2]: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.name: Ral's Outburst
cards.text: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
-Ral Zarek

cards.name: Roalesk, Apex Hybrid
cards.text:
Flying, trample
When Roalesk, Apex Hybrid enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.
When Roalesk dies, proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

foreignPrintings.name: 混種の頂点、ロアレスク

cards.name: Role Reversal
cards.text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.
cards.flavor: Uthlon the Wise scandalized sphinx society, hooting the answers to riddles as he rampaged through Tin Street. Grangle, on the other hand, sat for hours, deep in thought, largely ignored by fellow goblins.

cards.name: Rubblebelt Rioters
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Rubblebelt Rioters attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
cards.flavor:
"If the system is broken, break the system."
-Domri Rade

cards.name: Solar Blaze
cards.text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
cards.flavor:
"The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord."
-Aurelia

cards.name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink.
[+2]: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
[−X]: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

foreignPrintings.name: 復讐に燃えた血王、ソリン

cards.name: Soul Diviner
cards.text: {T}, Remove a counter from an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker you control: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.

cards.name: Storrev, Devkarin Lich
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.
cards.flavor: In times of war, only death flourishes.

foreignPrintings.name: デヴカリンのリッチ、ストーレフ

cards.name: Tamiyo, Collector of Tales
cards.text:
Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents.
[+1]: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[−3]: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

foreignPrintings.name: 伝承の収集者、タミヨウ

cards.name: Teferi, Time Raveler
cards.text:
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
[+1]: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.
[−3]: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

foreignPrintings.name: 時を解す者、テフェリー

cards.name: Tenth District Legionnaire
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.
cards.flavor:
"The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva."
-Tajic

cards.name: Time Wipe
cards.text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.
cards.flavor:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
-Teferi

cards.name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves
cards.text:
When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token.
Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and that creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Tyrant's Scorn
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"The hero with the magic sword slays the dragon? Not this time."
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Widespread Brutality
cards.text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

cards.name: Angrath, Captain of Chaos
cards.text:
Creatures you control have menace.
[−2]: Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

foreignPrintings.name: 混沌の船長、アングラス

cards.name: Ashiok, Dream Render
cards.text:
Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause their controller to search their library.
[−1]: Target player mills four cards. Then exile each opponent's graveyard.

foreignPrintings.name: 夢を引き裂く者、アショク

cards.name: Dovin, Hand of Control
cards.text:
Artifact, instant, and sorcery spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
[−1]: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.

cards.name: Huatli, the Sun's Heart
cards.text:
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
[−3]: You gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

foreignPrintings.name: 太陽の義士、ファートリ

cards.name: Kaya, Bane of the Dead
cards.text:
Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
[−3]: Exile target creature.

cards.name: Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner
cards.text:
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
[−1]: Untap target permanent.

foreignPrintings.name: ビヒモスを招く者、キオーラ

cards.name: Nahiri, Storm of Stone
cards.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.
[−X]: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

cards.name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
[−2]: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Samut, Tyrant Smasher
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
[−1]: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

cards.name: Vraska, Swarm's Eminence
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
[−2]: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

cards.name: Firemind Vessel
cards.text:
Firemind Vessel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add two mana of different colors.
cards.flavor: The city mourned Niv-Mizzet's death, but he left behind the components for his rebirth.

cards.name: God-Pharaoh's Statue
cards.text:
Spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: A dictator's infuriating smirk, an affront to everything Ravnica stood for.

cards.name: Guild Globe
cards.text:
When Guild Globe enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Guild Globe: Add two mana of different colors.
cards.flavor:
"Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break."
-Karn

cards.name: Iron Bully
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Why would someone have built ... wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
-Commander Grozdan

cards.name: Mana Geode
cards.text:
When Mana Geode enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor:
"I don't care if it's an all-powerful relic or a street vendor's lucky charm. If it brings you courage, wear it."
-Saheeli Rai

cards.name: Prismite
cards.text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: It didn't budge when the portal opened, nor when the ancient gods emerged. It came to life only when all ten guilds came together to face a common threat.

cards.name: Saheeli's Silverwing
cards.text:
Flying
When Saheeli's Silverwing enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target opponent's library.
cards.flavor: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."

cards.name: Blast Zone
cards.text:
Blast Zone enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Blast Zone.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Blast Zone: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Blast Zone.

cards.name: Emergence Zone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.
cards.flavor: The Planar Bridge opened over the Chamber of the Guildpact, reducing the symbol of Ravnica's endurance to rubble.

cards.name: Gateway Plaza
cards.text:
Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: Guild leaders focused their magic on the portal scar. Where the Chamber perished, a parun could be reborn.

foreignPrintings.name: ギルド門通りの公有地

cards.name: Interplanar Beacon
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

cards.name: Karn's Bastion
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor:
"I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."
-Karn

cards.name: Mobilized District
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}: Mobilized District becomes a 3/3 Citizen creature with vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature and planeswalker you control.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the strongest weapon you can hold in your hand is another hand.

cards.name: Gideon, the Oathsworn
cards.text:
Whenever you attack with two or more non-Gideon creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.
[+2]: Until end of turn, Gideon, the Oathsworn becomes a 5/5 white Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. (He can't attack if he was cast this turn.)
[−9]: Exile Gideon, the Oathsworn and each creature your opponents control.

foreignPrintings.name: 誓いを立てた者、ギデオン

cards.name: Desperate Lunge
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance-their last hope-flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.

cards.name: Gideon's Battle Cry
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
cards.flavor: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"

cards.name: Gideon's Company
cards.text:
Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Gideon's Company.
{3}{W}: Put a loyalty counter on target Gideon planeswalker.
cards.flavor: "For the Legion! For Ravnica!"

cards.name: Orzhov Guildgate
cards.text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
cards.flavor:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."
-Kaya

cards.name: Jace, Arcane Strategist
cards.text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
[+1]: Draw a card.
[−7]: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Guildpact Informant
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Guildpact Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
cards.flavor: "Of course you're being followed!"

foreignPrintings.name: ギルドパクトの密通者

cards.name: Jace's Projection
cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection.
{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.
cards.flavor: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."

cards.name: Jace's Ruse
cards.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Jace, Arcane Strategist, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
cards.flavor: "The Eternals can recognize faces. They just think I look like a blue minotaur."

cards.name: Simic Guildgate
cards.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
cards.flavor:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
-Vannifar

foreignPrintings.name: Porte de la guilde de Simic

cards.name: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge
cards.text:
Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
[+2]: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life.
[−3]: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
